name: Namco Museum Megamix
summary: Includes Cutie Q, Galaxian, Pac-Man, Rally-X, King & Balloon, New Rally-X, Bosconian, Galaga, Dig Dug, Super Pac-Man, Xevious, Mappy, Pac & Pal, Gaplus, Grobda, Motos, Dig Dug II and Pac-Mania, as well as five remade "remix" versions of Rally-X, Galaga, Grobda Motos, Gator Panic and Pac 'n Roll.
